title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Integrating Emotional Dimensions in Learning: Science and Emotion

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education knowledge and project-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify positive/negative emotions arising during science project execution and develop management strategies.
Learners can propose at least three instructional strategies integrating emotional elements when designing lessons combining student-centered activities and direct instruction.
Learners can apply methods to maintain learning motivation and enhance performance through peer feedback in PBL processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
